org.eclipse.scada.vi.model

Interface Figure

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Primitive
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Arc, ChartView, Ellipse, FigureContainer, Image, Line, Rectangle, Shape, Text
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcImpl, ChartViewImpl, EllipseImpl, FigureContainerImpl, FigureImpl, ImageImpl, LineImpl, RectangleImpl, ShapeImpl, TextImpl

    public interface Figure
extends Primitive
    A representation of the model object 'Figure'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Foreground Color
    • Background Color
    • Size
    • On Click
    • On Double Click
    • Cursor
    • Visible
    • Border
    • Opaque
    • Tool Tip

    See Also:
    VisualInterfacePackage.getFigure()
